scripts.uglify-dist: cd dist && $(npm bin)/uglifyjs ui-utils.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 --output ui-utils.min.js --source-map ui-utils.min.js.map
scripts.uglify-example: cd example && $(npm bin)/uglifyjs ui-utils.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 --output ui-utils.min.js --source-map ui-utils.min.js.map
scripts.dist: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run browserify-dist && npm run uglify-dist
scripts.example: rm -rf example && mkdir -p example && cp src/index.html example/ && npm run browserify-example && npm run uglify-example && npm run example-server
